content.question: Which of the following works is most similar to Pure Land in that it includes a photographic self-portrait?

choices.label: Dancing at the Louvre, from the series The French Collection, Part I; #1
Rebellious Silence, from the Women of Allah series

content.answer: Rebellious Silence, from the Women of Allah series

topic.text: 10.3: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe similarities and/or differences in two or more works of art using appropriate and relevant points of comparison.
